Se inició en ésta actividad por que vio que hay mucha demanda en el medio de transporte, al comienzo era complicado su trabajo, porque no conocía todas las zonas de la ciudad. Viene realizando ésta actividad solo desde hace más de 06 años, tiempo que le sirvió para hacerse conocido por el buen servicio que brinda.
Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja y gente que cada día se transporta a su centro de labores.
Le gusta mucho su oficio ya que le permite tener buenos ingresos a parte de darle facilidad de conocer mucha gente e interactuar, además de manejar su propio horario de trabajo y es independiente. Antes de iniciar con ésta actividad tenía muchos problemas económicos. Por tanto, tiene muchos planes pero por mientras solo desea seguir trabajando hasta juntar el capital suficiente para poder comprar otro mototaxi. Este es el préstamo número 04 con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tiene un respaldo económico a través del préstamo que le otorgan ya que así podrá concretar algunos planes que tiene para su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete a ser un socio cumplido y a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que quiere compenetrarse rápido a su banco comunal del cual tiene buenas referencias que son muy solidarios y puntuales.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará piezas y repuestos como llantas, cámaras, rodajes y otros, para arreglar su mototaxi y darle su mantenimiento así estará operativo y trabajando, considerando que si esta en buenas condiciones tendrá mas ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Marco, 42, is a good, kind, enterprising man who is separated from the mother of his 14-year-old son who does not live with him.  He lives in his parents’ house and he supports them economically.  Marco’s work consists in providing transportation which he does in his three-wheeled vehicle known as a mototaxi.  He does this work seeking passengers along streets and avenues to take them to their destinations in the city.  He started this activity because he noticed that demand for transportation is high.  At the onset, his work was complicated because he did not know all the city’s zones.  He’s been doing this work for more than six years now so he’s now become well-known for the good service he provides.  He considers his business to be profitable because of the good profits it yields and because people need transportation to their places of work every day.

He likes his work very much because it makes it possible for him to earn income in addition to the opportunity of getting to know many people and to interact with them.  Also, he can set his own schedule and work independently.  

Before starting this work, he had many economic problems so he now has many future plans but for now all he wants is to continue working to save up enough money to buy another mototaxi.

This is MFP loan #4 and he’s very happy to know that he’ll have economic back-up by means of this loan he’s being granted because he’ll be able to make some of his business plans reality.  On the other hand, he commits to be a responsible member and to make his installment payments punctually because he wants to quickly enter into the spirit of his communal bank which he has good references of for being very supportive and punctual.

He will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy spare parts like tires, inner tubes, wheels, etc. to repair his mototaxi and service it so that it will be in good operating condition because he feels that if it’s operating well he’ll earn higher income.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his mototaxi.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene, de 55 años, es un hombre alegre y muy trabajador, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene 03 hijos, los cuales son mayores y tienen familia propia. Vive en un fundo que pertenece a otro señor. Junto a su conviviente cuidan este fundo, trabajan mucho para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El trabajo de Rene consiste en la crianza de ganado vacuno, el se levanta muy temprano para salir a sacara a los animales de su corral, se encarga de darles su alimento y luego los lleva pastear, el cría sus animales junto al del dueño del fundo donde trabaja. Lleva más de 11 años en este trabajo y recién hace 06 años empezó con la crianza de su propio ganado, lo bueno es que puede ganar como guardián y al mismo tiempo tiene en la mira a sus animales, este trabajo lo realiza a lado de su conviviente quien esta siempre ahí para apoyarlo.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que es tranquilo y además de ver como sus animales crecen de a poco mientras les da su cuidado, espera poder mas adelante comprar un terreno en donde poder criar el solo sus animales. Este será su préstamo  número 06 con  la institución MFP. Por ello solicita de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy unidos y muy responsables.
Con el monto solicitado 3500 soles, comprará productos para su bodega que abrió hace poco en el cual su esposa pueda trabajar ahí y generar un ingreso extra para su economía.
texts.en:
René, 55, is a cheerful, very hardworking man living with his spouse with whom he has three children who are all adults with their own families.  He lives on an agricultural estate that belongs to someone else.  He and his spouse care take this estate and work hard to provide better quality of life for their family.

René’s work consists in raising cattle.  He rises early to take the animals out of the corral; he feeds them and then takes them out to pasture.   He raises his animals alongside the estate owner’s where he works.  He’s had this job for more than 11 years and started raising his own livestock six years ago.  The good thing is that he earns a salary as a caretaker and while also watching over his own animals.  He does this work alongside his spouse who is always there to support him.

What he likes about his work is that it’s tranquil and also likes to watch how his animals grow under his care.  He hopes later on to be able to buy a piece of land to care for his animals only.  This will be MFP loan #6 and he’s asking for your collaboration so he can make his plans reality.  He commits once again to make his payments like he’s done previously.  He’s very happy to belong to his communal bank because they are all united and very responsible.

He will use the requested 3,500 soles to buy merchandise for the grocery store he opened recently so his wife can work there and generate extra income.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his wife's store.

loans.name: Delphine

texts.en: Delphine is 26 years old. She is married with one child who is one year old. Her husband sells shoes. She has been in business for 10 years. She wants a loan to buy a machine that will let her finish her retailing cloth. The profits will assist her in buying a house.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine to use in preparing cloth for sale.

loans.name: Jonnabel

texts.en:
Jonnabel, age 31, is a fish vendor, selling dried and salted fish at the local market. She lives in Bien Unido, Bohol, Philippines, with her husband and their two young children. Her husband works as a fisherman. Jonnabel works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially when it comes to funding the schooling of her children.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more dried and salted fish to offer for sale at the market. 
 
Jonnabel dreams of making her business a success and to experience the fullness of life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy dried and salted fish to sell at market

loans.name: Gevina

texts.en:
Gevina is a thirty-year-old married woman with three children  living in Kasese, Uganda. For four years now she has been working as a nurse and she was inspired into service by her desire to fill the medical gaps in the country. In order to supplement her meager salary she decided to set up a retail shop and with the proceeds she is able to provide the basics to her family.

Gevina intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as bread, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as bread, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Javanshir

texts.en:
Javanshir is 23 years old. He lives in Dmanisi district with his wife and parents. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have 10 milk cows and 9 calves. They sell milk and calves locally. 

Javanshir is very hard-working young man and has a rich experience in his business. He requested a loan for purchasing calves. After purchasing additional calves, they will expand their cattle herd. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income they will improve their living conditions. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel lives in Gardnersville, one of the largest and most populated areas in Montserrado County.  He is 33 years old, married, with two children aged five and nine who are in school and live at home. He is a high school graduate and has a certificate in medicine. He worked as a physician's assistant to start this business, where he sells lots of drugs. One problem that he faced is the price of the drugs because he has to purchase the medicine in USD, and now the exchange rate USD to LRD is too high. He enjoys the many cases he receives every day. Whenever he doesn’t go to sell, his customers get  angry with him because sometimes he executes first aid. Most interestingly his business helps to pay his children's school fees and rent. Having enough money to support his home makes him proud of his business. He is asking for a loan to purchase more drugs like cough tablets and syrups, Paracetamol, Quinine, Amodaquine, etc. to increase his commodities to render good treatment to his customers. His dream is to educate his wife and children and to attend college in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more drugs like cough tablets and syrups, Paracetamol, Quinine, Amodaquine, etc. to increase his commodities to render good treatment to his customers.
